typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		reseller as ({en-ca} as (MarketPlaceResellerId as string, ResellerPrice as string, ResellerFormattedPrice as string, InventoryStatus as string)[], {en-us} as (MarketPlaceResellerId as string, ResellerPrice as string, ResellerFormattedPrice as string, InventoryStatus as string)[], {fr-ca} as (MarketPlaceResellerId as string, ResellerPrice as string, ResellerFormattedPrice as string, InventoryStatus as string)[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LoadJson
LoadJson foldDown(unroll(reseller.{en-ca}),
	mapColumn(
		reseller
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
